pr_title: CATROID-404 Insert existing user list as parameter of list functions

timeline.bodyText: Please try with dagger and dependency injection.

replies.bodyText: According to @SimonStefan this is not yet possible for fragments. As it will still take time till the concerning PR is merged ProjectManager.getInstance() should be used until then.
replies.author: mstoeg

timeline.bodyText: Please make a util method/class, or something else for this task. Because there are already two places where the user-list is added to the project.

timeline.message:
CATROID-404 Insert existing user list as parameter of list functions

- Refactor/Move tests out of FormulaEditorFunctionListTest
- Add UI espresso test to check if the last user list is inserted correctly.
- Add Unit test to check if Dialog pops up when there is no current user list.
